snippet: An Italian journalist and a Belgian scholar, both kidnapped in Syria in early April, have been released, the Italian government said Sunday.
abstract: Italian journalist Domenico Quirico and Belgian scholar Pierre Piccinin, who were both kidnapped in Syria in early April, have been released and are on plane to Italy; abductions of journalists by government-allied militias, rebel groups and criminal elements in Syria have increased sharply in 2013.
lead_paragraph: An Italian journalist and a Belgian scholar, both kidnapped in Syria in early April, have been released, the Italian government said Sunday.

headline.main: Journalist and Scholar Freed in Syria
headline.print_headline: Journalist And Scholar Freed in Syria
